using VM = {VMNamespace};

{
    public static class {ModelType}Extensions
    {
        public static DOMAIN.{ModelType} ToModel(this VM.{ModelType} viewModel)
        {
            return AwAgentConnectMapper.Map<VM.{ModelType}, DOMAIN.{ModelType}>(viewModel);
        }

        public static List<DOMAIN.{ModelType}> ToModel(this List<VM.{ModelType}> viewModel)
        {
            return AwAgentConnectMapper.Map<List<VM.{ModelType}>, List<DOMAIN.{ModelType}>>(viewModel);
        }

        public static void DefineMappings()
